Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
# H1

## H2

### H3

#### H4

##### H5

###### H6

$$
\begin{bmatrix}
	1 & x_0 & x_0^2 & \cdots & x_0^n \\
	1 & x_1 & x_1^2 & \cdots & x_1^n \\
	\vdots & \vdots & \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\
    1 & x_n & x_n^2 & \cdots & x_n^n  
\end{bmatrix}
\begin{bmatrix}
	a_0 \\ a_1 \\ \vdots \\ a_n
\end{bmatrix}
=
\begin{bmatrix}
	y_0 \\ y_1 \\ \vdots \\ y_n
\end{bmatrix}
$$

| 1    | 3    | 3    |
| ---- | ---- | ---- |
| 2    | 4    | 4    |
| 8    | 9    | 4    |
| 0    | =    | 765  |
| 1    | 124  | 5    |

```cpp
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

const double eps = 1e-15;
 
signed main()
{
	int a, b; cin >> a >> b;
	
	double l = 0, r = 1;
	while (r - l >= eps)
	{
//		printf ("%.10lf %.10lf\n", l, r);
		double mid = (l + r) / 2;
		if (ceil(mid * b) * a <= b) l = mid;
		else r = mid;	
	}
	printf("%.10lf\n", r);
	return 0;
}
```

# H1

## H2

### H3

#### H4

###### H6

$$
\begin{bmatrix}
	1 & x_0 & x_0^2 & \cdots & x_0^n \\
	1 & x_1 & x_1^2 & \cdots & x_1^n \\
	\vdots & \vdots & \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\
    1 & x_n & x_n^2 & \cdots & x_n^n  
\end{bmatrix}
\begin{bmatrix}
	a_0 \\ a_1 \\ \vdots \\ a_n
\end{bmatrix}
=
\begin{bmatrix}
	y_0 \\ y_1 \\ \vdots \\ y_n
\end{bmatrix}
$$

| 1    | 3    | 3    |
| ---- | ---- | ---- |
| 2    | 4    | 4    |
| 8    | 9    | 4    |
| 0    | =    | 765  |
| 1    | 124  | 5    |

```cpp
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

const double eps = 1e-15;
 
signed main()
{
	int a, b; cin >> a >> b;
	
	double l = 0, r = 1;
	while (r - l >= eps)
	{
//		printf ("%.10lf %.10lf\n", l, r);
		double mid = (l + r) / 2;
		if (ceil(mid * b) * a <= b) l = mid;
		else r = mid;	
	}
	printf("%.10lf\n", r);
	return 0;
}
```
